titre: Konosuba : God's Blessing on this Wonderful World
description: After a ridiculous and pathetic death, Kazuma Satou, a video game-loving high school student, finds himself before the goddess Aqua. She offers him a chance to be reincarnated in a fantasy world to fight the Demon King, allowing him to take any object or ability of his choice. Frustrated by the goddess's mockery, Kazuma chooses to take Aqua herself. Unfortunately for him, Aqua proves to be completely useless and the world they arrive in is far from as simple as an RPG. Accompanied by an explosion-obsessed mage and a masochistic crusader, Kazuma must now try to survive while managing his team of misfits.

titre: I'm Really not the Demon God's Lackey
description: Lin Jie runs a bookstore in a dangerous world filled with supernatural entities. Unbeknownst to him, the mysterious books he sells and the advice he gives are interpreted by others as the profound wisdom of a hidden Demon God. As more powerful beings seek his guidance, Lin Jie remains blissfully unaware of his growing reputation as an unfathomable entity.

genre: Romance - Supernatural - Slice of Life - Vampire
description: Ko Yamori, an insomniac middle schooler who can't sleep, decides to walk the streets at night. One night, he meets Nazuna Nanakusa, a vampire girl who offers him a different perspective on life. As Ko explores the night world with Nazuna, he discovers the freedom and excitement that come with the darkness.

Naofumi Iwatani is summoned to another world as one of the Four Cardinal Heroes, wielding the Legendary Shield. However, he is quickly betrayed and falsely accused, losing his reputation and allies. With only his shield and a slave girl named Raphtalia, Naofumi must overcome adversity and prove himself while fighting the Waves of Catastrophe threatening the world.

titre: Genius Prince's Guide to Raising Nation Out of Debt
description: Prince Wein Salema Arbalest wants to sell his weak kingdom and live a comfortable life. However, his brilliant strategies and tactics keep succeeding beyond his intentions, making his nation stronger and thwarting his plans to escape responsibility. Despite his lazy ambitions, he must navigate political intrigue while secretly hoping to fail.

In a world where adventurers seek glory fighting powerful monsters, one man dedicates himself entirely to exterminating goblins—creatures often dismissed as weak. The Goblin Slayer, as he's known, has a dark past that drives his single-minded obsession. His brutal efficiency in hunting goblins earns him both respect and notoriety among other adventurers.

titre: The Greatest Demon Lord is Reborn as a Typical Nobody
description: Varvatos, the most powerful Demon Lord, grows bored of his overwhelming strength and reincarnates thousands of years later as a villager named Ard. He hopes to live a peaceful life as an ordinary person, but his past-life powers and knowledge make him anything but typical in the magic academy he attends.

titre: Our Last Crusade or The Rise of a New World
description: Two nations have been at war for years: the Empire, which uses advanced science and technology, and the Nebulis Sovereignty, which wields powerful magic. Iska, the Empire's greatest warrior, and Aliceliese, the Ice Calamity Witch and princess of Nebulis, meet on the battlefield. Despite being enemies, they develop mutual respect and feelings for each other, questioning the war that divides them.

A modern man finds himself married to Daji, the legendary nine-tailed fox from Chinese mythology known for her beauty and mischief. As they navigate married life together, supernatural chaos and comedic situations ensue, blending ancient mythology with contemporary domestic life.

titre: Re:Zero Starting Life in Another World
genre: Adventure - Dark Fantasy - Isekai - Psychological - Drama
description: Subaru Natsuki is suddenly transported to a fantasy world. He soon discovers he has gained the ability 'Return by Death,' allowing him to reverse time by dying. However, he retains all memories of his previous timelines while everyone else forgets. Subaru must use this ability to protect those he cares about, especially Emilia, a silver-haired girl he meets, while enduring the psychological trauma of repeated deaths.

Iori Kitahara moves to a coastal town to attend college and joins the diving club. However, the club is more focused on wild parties and drinking than actual diving. What follows is a hilarious college comedy filled with outrageous antics, genuine friendships, and occasional diving adventures.

Mikhail Walpurgis, the world's only 9th-circle Archmage, is betrayed and killed after defeating the Demon King. He awakens in the past with all his knowledge intact, determined to change his fate and become even stronger while avoiding past mistakes.

Kiyotaka Ayanokouji enrolls in Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School, where students enjoy freedoms and are rewarded with points for their merit. However, he's placed in Class D, the lowest tier. As social and academic battles unfold, Kiyotaka's true abilities gradually come to light.

Shinpei Ajiro returns to his hometown after his childhood friend Ushio mysteriously drowns. However, he soon discovers supernatural entities called 'Shadows' that can duplicate humans. When he's killed, he finds himself in a time loop. Using his knowledge from previous loops, Shinpei must uncover the truth and save his loved ones.

Kim Gongja, an F-rank hunter, awakens a unique skill: he can copy the abilities of anyone who kills him, but he must die first and time rewinds. Through countless deaths and resurrections, he transforms from a weak, envious person into a powerful force, using death itself as a path to strength while exploring profound themes of mortality and sacrifice.

Elaina, a young witch, travels the world experiencing various adventures and meeting diverse people. Each journey teaches her something new about the world and herself, presenting both beautiful and dark aspects of humanity.

titre: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a slime
description: Satoru Mikami, a 37-year-old corporate worker, is killed and reincarnated in a fantasy world as a slime. Despite his seemingly weak form, he possesses unique abilities like consuming and mimicking other creatures. Taking the name Rimuru Tempest, he builds a nation where monsters and all races can coexist peacefully.

titre: Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in Country Side
description: Red, once a member of the Hero's party, is banished for being 'too weak.' He decides to open an apothecary in a quiet frontier town and enjoy a peaceful life. However, his past companions, including the Hero herself (his sister), soon come looking for him.

Kelvin awakens in another world after sacrificing his memories for powerful summoning abilities. As a battle-obsessed summoner, he travels the world seeking strong opponents while building his party of summoned creatures and companions.

titre: Demon x Angel Can't Get Along
description: A demon and an angel, natural enemies, are forced to live together and attend the same school. Despite their initial antagonism and attempts to sabotage each other, they gradually form an unlikely bond.

Kim GiGyu awakens as a player but has a unique problem: he can't level up beyond Level 1. Instead, he can tame monsters and make them his servants. With this unusual ability, he must find his own path to strength in a world dominated by high-level players.

Helmut was abandoned in the demonic Forest of Pace as a baby but miraculously survived. Raised by a legendary sword master, he grows up isolated from human society. When his master dies, Helmut ventures into the human world for the first time, possessing incredible swordsmanship but no understanding of social norms.

titre: My Youth Romantic Comedy is Wrong as I Expected
description: Hachiman Hikigaya is a cynical loner forced to join the Service Club, where he meets the perfect and beautiful Yukino Yukinoshita. Together with the cheerful Yui Yuigahama, they help other students while navigating complex social dynamics and their own feelings.

Nasa Yuzaki meets a beautiful girl named Tsukasa who saves his life. Years later, she suddenly appears and agrees to date him on one condition: they must get married first. The story follows their newlywed life filled with wholesome moments and gentle comedy.

Nagi Umino and Erika Amano discover they were switched at birth. To resolve the situation and unite the two families, their parents decide to engage them. The only problem: they are completely opposite and can barely stand each other, despite slowly developing feelings.

Miko Yotsuya suddenly gains the ability to see horrifying spirits and monsters invisible to others. Deciding it's best to ignore them, she goes about her daily life pretending not to see the terrifying entities surrounding her, leading to both horrific and comedic situations.
A mysterious boy brings death wherever he goes. As he seeks to understand his cursed existence and find a way to live without causing harm, he encounters various supernatural threats and allies.

Kim YuWon regresses to the past after failing to stop the destruction of the Tower of the Gods. With his memories intact, he climbs the tower again, determined to grow stronger and prevent the catastrophe that destroyed everything he loved.

Satan, the Demon Lord, is forced to retreat to modern-day Tokyo after being defeated by the Hero. Unable to use magic in this world, he must work part-time at MgRonald's to survive, while planning his eventual return to conquer his original world.

The protagonist possesses an ability that allows him to level up at an unprecedented rate. As he quickly surpasses other hunters, he must deal with the attention and challenges that come with rapid growth in a dangerous world.

titre: My Stepmom's Daughter is My Ex
description: Yume Irido and Mizuto Izumi were once a couple in middle school who broke up badly. Years later, their parents marry each other, making them step-siblings living under the same roof. They make a pact to forget their past romance, but living together proves more complicated than expected.

titre: The S - Class That I Raised
description: Han Yoojin is an F-rank hunter whose younger brother is S-rank. After his brother abandons him, Yoojin regresses to the past and awakens a unique skill: he can raise others' ranks. He decides to build his own team of S-rank hunters and change his fate.

Miyuki Shirogane and Kaguya Shinomiya are the brilliant student council president and vice president of the prestigious Shuchiin Academy. Both secretly love each other but are too proud to confess. They engage in elaborate schemes to make the other confess first, turning romance into psychological warfare.

Kim Soo-Hyun is reincarnated into a dangerous fantasy world called Lost Saga after 10 years of hell-like survival there in his first life. With all his memories and experience, he resolves to not just survive this time, but to conquer this brutal world.

Mysterious objects called 'Third Eyes' fall from the sky, granting humans strange powers. Minoru Utsugi receives a power that isolates him from others, allowing him to reject all external forces. He's recruited by a special organization to fight against those who use their powers for evil.

genre: Comedy - Fantasy - Romance - Slice of Life
description: Kazuhiro Kitase regularly visits a fantasy world in his dreams where he adventured with the beautiful elf Marie. When Marie discovers she can travel to his world, she begins visiting modern Japan, experiencing its culture, food, and growing closer to Kazuhiro.

Amakawa Haruto dies in an accident and awakens as Rio, an orphan in a slum of another world. With memories of both lives, he rescues a kidnapped princess and enrolls in a prestigious academy, navigating class discrimination while searching for his childhood friend from his previous life.

Touya Mochizuki is accidentally killed by God and given a second life in a fantasy world. As compensation, he receives a special smartphone that works even in this magical realm, along with enhanced physical and magical abilities.

In a world overrun by monsters and gates, a necromancer fights alone, commanding an army of undead. His unique abilities make him both feared and invaluable as he battles to survive in this dangerous new reality.
The son of the legendary hero tries to live up to his father's reputation while carving his own path. Despite the pressure of his lineage, he faces adventures with determination and humor.

titre: Hidden Dungeon Only I Could Enter
description: Noir, a poor noble, discovers a hidden dungeon that only he can enter. Inside, he meets a legendary adventurer who grants him unique skills. Using the dungeon's treasures and abilities, he enrolls in a hero academy while keeping his secret dungeon hidden.

titre: The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodbyes
description: Kaoru discovers a mysterious tunnel that grants wishes but steals time from your life. When his friend Anzu wants to use it to save someone, they must navigate the tunnel's rules while confronting their feelings and the cost of their desires.

In a world where nations employ spy teams, a legendary spy takes on the mission of training seven talented but inexperienced girls. Together, they must complete an 'impossible mission' with a 90% mortality rate while uncovering secrets about their instructor and each other.

Yuuta's father remarries, and his new stepsister is Saki, a popular girl from his school. They agree to maintain a purely formal relationship despite living together. However, as they spend time together, their feelings gradually become more complicated.

Jin is a high school student living a quiet life, but he hides a dark secret: his father is a serial killer, and Jin has been forced to help him. When his father targets a classmate Jin cares about, he must decide how far he'll go to protect her.

titre: Princess, Please Stay Away From Me
description: A commoner wants nothing to do with a princess who has taken an interest in him. Despite his attempts to avoid her, the persistent princess continues pursuing him, leading to comedic situations as he tries to maintain distance while she closes in.

In 19th century Paris, Noé Archiviste seeks the Book of Vanitas, a cursed grimoire. He meets Vanitas, a human claiming the book's power, who uses it to cure vampires of their curses. Together they investigate incidents while unraveling mysteries about the book and Vanitas himself.

titre: Of All Things I Became A Crow
description: After dying, a person reincarnates as a crow in a fantasy world. Using their human intelligence in a crow's body, they navigate this new existence, discovering unexpected advantages to their avian form while trying to understand their new life.

In a world ruled by tyrannical gods, a group of rebels learns ancient techniques to kill divine beings. The story follows their dangerous quest to overthrow the gods and free humanity, facing divine wrath and moral dilemmas along the way.

Theodore Miller, a failed magic student, discovers a grimoire that allows him to absorb books and gain their knowledge instantly. As he consumes more magical texts, he rapidly becomes one of the most knowledgeable mages, mastering spells that took others decades to learn.

Maruo Endo, a boy who trained his body to superhuman levels inspired by manga, meets an ayashimon girl seeking to become a yakuza boss in the supernatural underworld. Together they challenge yokai crime syndicates in a world where monsters secretly control society.

The protagonist possesses supernatural luck that makes impossible odds work in their favor. However, their good luck often comes with unexpected consequences, creating both comedic and dangerous situations as they navigate through life.

titre: My Death Flags Show no Sign of Ending
description: A man is reincarnated as Harold, a death-flagged character doomed to die in every route of an otome game. Using his knowledge of the game, he tries to avoid his numerous death endings while acting cruel to push away the game's heroines and survive.

Agent Six of the evil organization Kisaragi Corporation is sent to a fantasy world to scout for invasion. With a powerful android partner and limited support from Earth, he must complete missions while dealing with the quirks of both his organization and the fantasy world.

titre: The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius
description: A lazy prince who pretended to be incompetent to avoid responsibility accidentally reveals his genius-level intellect. Forced into the spotlight, he must now use his abilities while trying to maintain his comfortable lazy lifestyle.

titre: I'm The Only One with Genius DNA
description: In a world where genetic modifications create superhumans, the protagonist discovers they possess unique genius-level DNA that no one else has. This makes them both a valuable asset and a target for various organizations seeking to exploit or eliminate them.

Two top players of a game find themselves reincarnated as characters within it. With their extensive knowledge of all the game's endings, they work together to prevent the world's destruction while creating their own perfect ending.

titre: He Does not Have Any Friends
description: A high school student who claims not to need friends finds his solitary life disrupted when others insist on befriending him. Despite his protests, he gradually forms connections, discovering that friendship might not be as bad as he thought.

A doctor gains a game-like leveling system that improves his medical skills. As he levels up, he can perform increasingly miraculous treatments, revolutionizing medicine while uncovering the system's mysterious origin.

Yuuichi Katagiri values friendship above all else. When he and his friends are forced to play the 'Tomodachi Game' to pay off a debt, they must complete challenges that test the bonds of friendship. As money and betrayal become factors, Yuuichi must decide how much friendship is truly worth.

titre: My Young Lady is A Neet
description: A servant takes care of a noble young lady who has become a shut-in NEET. The story follows their daily life as he tries to help her overcome her social withdrawal while dealing with her eccentric behavior and their growing relationship.

A continuation of Hachiman Hikigaya's story as he navigates the complexities of relationships in the Service Club. This new chapter explores deeper emotional territories as the characters face graduation and their futures.

In a world where ordinary people can transform into powerful beings called Choujin, Tokio Kurohara, a timid high school student, becomes a Choujin by accident. He must navigate this dangerous new reality alongside his friend Azuma. From the creator of Tokyo Ghoul.

titre: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten
genre: Comedy - Romance - School Life - Slice of Life
description: Amane Fujimiya lives alone while his parents work overseas. His beautiful neighbor Mahiru Shiina, known as the school's 'Angel,' discovers his messy lifestyle and begins taking care of him. Despite their different personalities, they gradually grow closer.

A brilliant strategist uses his vast knowledge and tactical genius to navigate dangerous situations. Despite being physically weak, his intellect makes him invaluable and feared in a world where strength usually dominates.

A modern man is reincarnated as a criminal scheduled for execution. He takes on the identity of a deceased professor at a prestigious magic academy. Using his knowledge and quick thinking, he must survive while uncovering conspiracies within the academy.

A story exploring the friendship and potential romance between characters with contrasting personalities based on zodiac traits. The Capricorn friend's practical nature clashes and complements their partner's characteristics in daily situations.

genre: Drama - Romance - School Life - Slice of Life
description: Two insomniacs, Ganta Nakami and Isaki Magari, discover each other in their school's abandoned astronomy observatory. Finding solace in each other's company during sleepless nights, they form a unique bond while rediscovering their passion for astronomy and perhaps love.

titre: To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor
description: A doctor reincarnates in a fantasy world where everyone expects him to be a saint with holy healing powers. However, he insists on using actual medical science rather than magic, applying modern medical techniques to a medieval fantasy setting.

A gamer awakens in his game character's body - a powerful skeleton knight. Unable to remove his helmet without revealing his skeletal face, he adventures through a fantasy world helping those in need while searching for other players and a way to regain his human form.

titre: My Instant Death Ability is so Over Powered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me!
description: Yogiri Takatou awakens in another world with his classmates, but he's left behind as bait for monsters. Fortunately, he possesses an instant-death ability that kills anything he wishes to die. With this overwhelming power, he and a companion traverse the fantasy world.

Jaehyun awakens abilities related to Norse mythology after obtaining a mythical item. In a world filled with dungeons and monsters, he must use his unique powers to survive and uncover the truth behind his abilities.

titre: Sword Fanatic Wanders Through the Night
description: A sword fanatic wanders through the night, seeking worthy opponents and perfecting his blade techniques. His obsession with the sword leads him through dark paths, facing supernatural threats and powerful warriors in his eternal quest for mastery.

In a world where superhumans battle on designated battlefields, participants fight for survival, glory, and resources. The story follows combatants navigating this brutal system while uncovering the truth behind the superhuman phenomenon.

In a fantasy world, a tax collector with extraordinary powers ensures everyone pays their dues. Using both bureaucratic authority and overwhelming strength, they hunt down tax evaders, making them the most feared government official in the realm.

A juvenile prison serves as the setting for intense psychological drama and action. Inmates must survive the harsh environment while dealing with their past crimes, corrupt guards, and the brutal hierarchy among prisoners.

In a world where ancient runes grant magical powers, children born with rune marks are destined for greatness or tragedy. The story follows these rune children as they discover their abilities, face their destinies, and battle forces seeking to exploit their power.

Tetsuo, a mild-mannered office worker who loves mystery novels, discovers his daughter's boyfriend is abusing her and connected to the yakuza. When he accidentally kills the boyfriend, he and his wife must use crime novel tactics to cover up the murder and protect their family.

A being ascending or reigning as the Demon King must navigate the responsibilities and challenges of demonic rulership. Whether conquering, defending their realm, or challenging the status quo, they reshape the demon world and its relationship with other races.

A newbie in a VR game discovers he has overwhelming power from the start. As he explores the game world, his strength attracts both allies and enemies, while mysterious forces take interest in his abnormal abilities.

An ancient book called Lagier contains powerful magic and forbidden knowledge. Those who possess it are drawn into adventures filled with magic, mystery, and danger as various factions seek to control or destroy the book and its secrets.

A master swordsman dies and is reincarnated in his younger body. With his experience and a mysterious ability to sense swords, he aims to reach even greater heights in the martial world while avoiding past mistakes.

Cid Kagenou dreams of becoming a mastermind who manipulates events from the shadows. After being reincarnated in a fantasy world, he creates a secret organization called Shadow Garden, pretending to fight an evil cult. Ironically, the cult he made up actually exists, and his wild fabrications keep coming true.

Hamel, a warrior who fought alongside the hero for 10 years against the Demon King, fails at the final moment. 300 years later, he's reincarnated as Eugene Lionheart, a distant descendant of his old comrade. With memories of his past life, he aims to finish what he started.

titre: I Become a Renowned Family's Sword Prodigy
description: A modern-day swordsman awakens in the body of Baek Woojin, the disgraceful son of a renowned swordsman family. Using his previous life's knowledge and determination, he aims to become the strongest while changing his family's fate.

The Republic of San Magnolia fights against the Empire's autonomous drones with their own unmanned weapons. Or so the public believes. In reality, the 'unmanned' units are piloted by the Eighty-Six, people deemed subhuman, who fight and die in a war where their existence is denied.

genre: Adventure - Fantasy - Magic - Slice of Life
description: Coco, a girl who dreams of being a witch, discovers that magic is drawn with ink and not an inborn talent. After accidentally cursing her mother, she becomes apprenticed to the witch Qifrey, learning magic while searching for a way to save her mother.

titre: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
description: Alisa Mikhailovna Kujou, a half-Russian beauty, sits next to Masachika Kuze. She often makes flirtatious comments to him in Russian, thinking he doesn't understand. Little does she know, he's fluent in Russian and understands every word.

Kim Hajin is the author of a web novel about heroes at a magic academy. When he's pulled into his own story as an unnamed extra character, he must use his knowledge of the plot to survive and protect the world, all while changing events from behind the scenes.

titre: The Healing Priest of the Sun
description: A healer priest uses divine powers to cure the sick and injured in a fantasy world. Despite being support class, his healing abilities become crucial in battles and adventures, proving that healers can be just as important as fighters.

Students at a special academy train to transcend human limitations and gain supernatural powers. The protagonist must survive harsh training, compete with talented peers, and face threats from those who oppose the academy's existence.

As a child, Pyo Wol is kidnapped and forced to train as an assassin in complete darkness. He emerges as a perfect killing machine but seeks revenge against those who destroyed his childhood. He navigates the martial arts world as a silent reaper, pursuing his targets with cold efficiency.

A group of students with different academic abilities forms a study group. As they help each other with schoolwork, romantic feelings and comedic situations develop, exploring friendship and young love through their academic struggles.

titre: Heavenly demon can't live a normal life
description: A heavenly demon, one of the most powerful beings in the martial world, tries to live a normal life after achieving supreme power. However, his overwhelming strength and demonic nature constantly attract trouble, making a peaceful existence impossible.

In a world of mystery and supernatural elements, the story follows characters connected to Egrette, navigating through intrigue, action, and revelations that challenge their understanding of their world and themselves.

Rudo lives in a trash-filled world where people are divided between the wealthy above and the poor below. Framed for murder and exiled, he discovers he can transform trash into weapons. He joins the Cleaners, warriors who fight monstrous creatures born from human malice.

High school students in a ghost story club investigate urban legends and supernatural phenomena. What starts as hobby quickly becomes dangerous as they encounter real ghosts and uncover dark secrets hidden in their town's history.

A legendary yakuza is reincarnated in a fantasy world as Ryu, the daughter of a noble family. Despite her new female form, she retains her yakuza spirit and fighting skills, creating chaos in a world of swords and magic with her modern-world wisdom and combat prowess.

Hunters with special abilities track down and eliminate malevolent spirits that threaten humanity. The protagonist uses unique spirit-hunting techniques to face increasingly dangerous supernatural entities while uncovering mysteries about the spirit world.

titre: I Became the Tyrant of a Defense Game
description: A man awakens inside a defense game he played, inhabiting the body of the game's worst prince. Using his extensive knowledge of the game's strategies and future events, he must defend against monstrous invasions while navigating royal politics.

titre: My School Life Pretending to be a Worthless Person
description: The protagonist hides his true abilities, pretending to be worthless to avoid attention. However, circumstances constantly force him to reveal his skills while trying to maintain his low-profile facade, creating comedic and action-packed situations.

Kang Woojin spent 20 years surviving in another dimension before returning to Earth. Back in Seoul, he discovers monsters and dungeons have appeared. With his necromancy powers from the other world, he adapts to humanity's new reality as a powerful awakened being.

A man becomes a player in a mysterious healing game that manifests in reality. He must use the game's abilities to solve supernatural incidents and help tormented spirits, all while uncovering the truth behind the game and his own connection to it.

A manager cursed with bad luck dies and regresses to the past. Using his knowledge of future events and learning from his cursed experiences, he works to build a successful team and change his tragic fate.

A female knight serves as the shadow of the crown prince, protecting him from the darkness while hiding her own identity and feelings. Political intrigue and romance develop as she navigates court conspiracies and her growing connection with the prince.

After being frozen for 25 years following his battle with the Frost Queen, Seo Jun-Ho awakens to find the world has changed. Humanity has adapted to the dungeons, but he remains the only one who cleared the first floor's boss. He begins climbing again with his past experience.

Members of a ghost story club investigate urban legends and supernatural occurrences. What starts as curiosity quickly becomes dangerous as they uncover real horrors lurking behind ghost stories, forcing them to confront actual supernatural threats.

A man awakens in a sealed underground prison with the ability to read others' minds. As he tries to escape, he uncovers the secrets of this mysterious facility and the other inmates, using his telepathy to navigate the psychological warfare and dangerous challenges.

titre: How to Survive at the Academy (Web Novel)
description: A person is transmigrated into a brutal fantasy academy known for its harsh training and high mortality rate. Using knowledge from the original story, they must survive the academy's dangerous curriculum while avoiding death flags and changing their fate.

Taro Sakamoto, once the world's greatest hitman, has retired to become a convenience store owner and devoted family man. When his past catches up to him, he must protect his peaceful life using his assassin skills despite his now-overweight appearance.

titre: Reincarnation of the Strongest Sword God
description: Shi Feng, a top player, regresses 10 years to when the VR game God's Domain launched. With his experience and knowledge of the future, he aims to reach the apex, correcting past mistakes and building a powerful guild.

titre: The Reincarnated Assasin is a Genius Swordsman (Web Novel)
description: A modern assassin reincarnates as a young swordsman in a fantasy world. Using his assassination techniques combined with sword skills, he becomes a formidable warrior, navigating both the sword path and his dark past.

A martial artist at the peak of his power reincarnates to correct past mistakes. With his vast experience and knowledge, he aims to reach even greater heights while protecting those he lost in his previous life.

After being trapped in Hell for 10,000 years, the world's first player returns to Earth. With unimaginable power gained from his time in Hell, he must readapt to a world that moved on without him while dealing with new threats.

A champion fighter from the modern world enters the murim (martial arts world). Using his combat sports experience combined with martial arts training, he creates a unique fighting style that challenges traditional martial artists.

A man discovers that his adopted daughter is actually a dragon in human form. As he raises her while hiding her true identity, comedic situations arise from her dragon instincts, immense power, and attempts to live as a normal child.

Evan D. Sherden reincarnates as an extra character in a game world, one destined for an early death. Using his knowledge of the game, he works to survive and thrive, turning his extra role into something significant while avoiding numerous death flags.

In a world where individuals can manifest their 'Existence' as supernatural powers, the protagonist must grow stronger to survive conflicts between various factions seeking to control these abilities and reshape reality itself.

A hidden player with special privileges navigates through a game-like world. Using secret quests and unique abilities unavailable to others, they grow stronger while uncovering the mysteries behind the game system and their special status.

An SSS-Class ranker who reached the top of the tower dies and regresses to the beginning. With his vast experience and knowledge of future events, he aims to climb even faster and prevent the tragedies that befell his comrades.

titre: On My Way to Kill God
description: A warrior embarks on a journey to kill God, facing divine beings, mythical creatures, and other god-slayers along the way. As he grows stronger, he uncovers the truth about the gods and the world's creation.

Adventurers explore mysterious dungeons filled with monsters and treasures. The protagonist's odyssey through these dungeons reveals ancient secrets, powerful artifacts, and the true nature of the dungeon system threatening humanity.

titre: Warrior High School - Dungeon Raid Department
description: A specialized high school trains students to raid dungeons. In the Dungeon Raid Department, students learn combat skills, teamwork, and strategy while facing actual dungeon threats as part of their curriculum.

In a world where aliens secretly live among humans, special agents protect both species from threats. The protagonist joins this organization, dealing with alien crimes, conspiracies, and threats to Earth's security.

Unlike typical heroes, the protagonist embraces being a villain. They build their evil organization, gather minions, and pursue their villainous ambitions without pretense, creating chaos in a world dominated by heroes.

A young man dies and is reincarnated in a fantasy world, raised by Merlin Wolford, a legendary hero. Growing up with overpowered magic abilities but no common sense, he enters a magic academy, where his unique perspective and overwhelming power shock everyone.

After discovering cheat abilities in a game-turned-reality world, the protagonist uses these overpowered advantages to rapidly gain strength. However, using cheats attracts attention from both allies and enemies seeking to exploit or eliminate him.

Mikhail Walpurgis, the world's only 9th-circle Archmage, is betrayed and killed after defeating the Demon King. He awakens in the past with all his knowledge intact, determined to change his fate and become even stronger while avoiding past mistakes.

A mysterious virtual reality game traps players in a fantasy world where death is permanent. As a master sniper, the protagonist must use his unique skills to survive and uncover the truth behind the game.

titre: Second Life of a Trash Princess
description: A princess treated as trash due to her low status dies and regresses to her childhood. With knowledge of her previous life's mistakes and betrayals, she works to change her fate and prove her worth to the royal family.

titre: Reaper of the Drifting Moon (Web Novel)
description: Pyo Wol, kidnapped as a child and trained as an assassin in complete darkness, emerges as a perfect killing machine. He navigates the martial arts world as a silent reaper, pursuing revenge while uncovering the conspiracy behind his tragic past.

titre: I'll be Taking a Break for Personal Reason
description: A powerful individual decides to take a break from their responsibilities for personal reasons. However, their vacation is constantly interrupted by former allies, enemies, and crises that only they can resolve, making rest impossible.

The protagonist possesses a devouring system that allows them to consume anything - skills, items, or even other beings - to grow stronger. In a cultivation world where power is everything, this ability makes them both envied and feared.

A demonic martial artist reincarnates as a disciple of Mount Kunlun, one of the most righteous sects. With his demonic techniques and orthodox training, he creates a unique path while hiding his true nature from his sect.

In a game-like world, the protagonist adopts the role of a troll, using unconventional and annoying strategies to defeat enemies. Despite seeming silly, their troll tactics prove surprisingly effective against serious opponents.

A duke who lived a life full of regrets gets a chance to return to the past. With memories of his mistakes, he works to redeem himself, protect his loved ones, and change the tragic fate that awaited his family.

The daughter of a duke uses her intelligence and schemes to navigate high society. With her devious plans and unexpected tactics, she upends the social order while pursuing her own goals and romantic interests.

Yuki, a university student who is deaf, meets Itsuomi, a multilingual traveler. Despite the communication barrier, they develop feelings for each other. The story explores their growing relationship with sensitivity and warmth as they learn to understand each other.

In a world where everyone has specific abilities, the protagonist is classified as an irregular with powers that don't fit any category. At a special academy, they must prove their worth despite being different from everyone else.

A legendary sword with consciousness and overwhelming power chooses its wielder. Together, they embark on adventures, with the sword's ancient knowledge and immense power making them an unstoppable force.

A modern doctor is reincarnated into a martial arts world. Using his medical knowledge combined with martial arts, he becomes a physician who can both heal and fight, revolutionizing medicine in a world focused on combat.

A tyrant ruler uses overwhelming power and cunning strategies to maintain control. Despite their harsh methods, their leadership protects the nation from external threats and internal chaos, forcing others to question what true tyranny means.

A knight sworn to protect a princess discovers dark secrets about the kingdom. As political intrigue unfolds, they must choose between duty and love while facing threats from those who seek to control the throne.

Estio, able to communicate with all living beings, is considered cursed by society. When he joins a mercenary group, his unique ability proves invaluable. The story follows his journey of acceptance and understanding in a world that feared him.

A member of the Demonic Cult is betrayed and dies, only to reincarnate in the body of a young noble. With his martial arts knowledge and a legendary sword technique, he navigates the orthodox martial world while concealing his demonic origin.

Dawoon is trapped in a deadly tutorial dungeon that resets every time. However, due to a glitch, he's not reset with everyone else. This allows him to repeatedly exploit the tutorial, gathering resources and growing stronger in unique ways while everyone else struggles to survive.

A lazy but clever boss constantly struggles to maintain his image as competent while his incredibly skilled underling handles all the real work. The comedy unfolds as he takes credit while trying not to be exposed.

The Demon Lord, bored with magic, reincarnates to pursue martial arts instead. With his demon heritage and pursuit of martial perfection, he creates a unique path combining demonic power with martial techniques.

titre: I Regressed to my Ruined Family
description: After his family falls to ruin and he dies in despair, the protagonist regresses to the past. Armed with knowledge of future events, he works to prevent his family's downfall and change their destiny.

titre: I'm Not That Kind of Talent
description: Deon Hart, known as the Demon Arut, is actually a misunderstood person who is terrible at communication. Despite being feared as a ruthless commander, he's simply trying his best to survive in a demon army while everyone misinterprets his actions.

genre: Action - Adventure - Fantasy 📌By the Creator of <One Punch Man> and <Mob Psycho 100 >

titre: I Used to be a Boss
description: A former boss from a game world is now living in reality or another setting. Using their boss-level powers and knowledge, they navigate their new circumstances while dealing with the consequences of their previous status.

A relationship develops with a tyrannical ruler known for their harsh methods. As the story unfolds, the tyrant's complex motivations and hidden vulnerabilities are revealed, challenging perceptions of power and cruelty.

titre: Life of a Magic Academy Mage
description: A student navigates life at a prestigious magic academy, learning spells, making friends and rivals, and facing various challenges. The academy setting provides both education and adventure as mysteries and threats emerge.

An SSS-rank summoner who works alone commands powerful creatures. Despite pressure to join guilds or parties, they maintain independence, using their exceptional summoning abilities to handle challenges that require entire teams.

titre: The Story of a Cursed Armor
description: A cursed suit of armor possesses or bonds with individuals, granting immense power at a terrible cost. The story follows those who wear it as they struggle with the armor's curse while utilizing its strength to face threats.

titre: What's Wrong with Being the Villainess
description: Reincarnated as a villainess in an otome game, the protagonist decides to embrace her role rather than try to become likeable. She questions why being a villainess is considered wrong and lives according to her own values.

A surgeon gains game-like abilities and a player interface. Using his medical knowledge combined with RPG mechanics, he performs miraculous treatments while navigating a world where medical procedures work like game skills.

After experiencing a catastrophic future, the protagonist returns to the past with knowledge of what's to come. This remake retells their journey to prevent disaster, save loved ones, and change humanity's tragic fate.

A death god or being with death-related powers navigates a world where life and death hold special significance. They face challenges related to their role as a harbinger of death while dealing with the consequences of their powers.

Reincarnated or regressed as an emperor known for madness, the protagonist must navigate imperial politics, warfare, and supernatural threats. They use knowledge of future events and the Mad Emperor's fearsome reputation to their advantage.

titre: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups : This Gyaru is Head Over Heels for Me
description: An introverted boy finds himself the target of a popular gyaru's affections. Despite his social anxiety and her outgoing nature, their relationship develops through humorous misunderstandings and his struggle to believe she's genuinely interested.

Shirone, an orphan who learned to read in a noble's library, dreams of becoming a mage despite his commoner status. When his talent for magic is discovered, he enters the prestigious Alpheas Magic Academy, where he must overcome discrimination and prove his worth.

A game developer awakens inside his own mobile gacha game as a one-star character. To survive and return to his world, he must help various players who summon him while dealing with the absurdity of being a low-tier character in a game he designed.

A reimagining of the classic Dororo story, where a young warrior travels the land reclaiming his body parts stolen by demons. Accompanied by a thief, he faces supernatural horrors in a dark feudal Japan while questioning the nature of humanity.

titre: Transmigrating to the Otherworld Once More
description: Someone who has already been transmigrated once finds themselves transported to yet another world. Using experience from their previous isekai adventure, they navigate this new fantasy realm with a jaded yet practical approach.

After humanity falls to monsters, the protagonist regresses to before the catastrophe. As a player with unique regression abilities, they use knowledge of the future to prevent humanity's downfall and grow stronger through repeated timelines.

Choi Seong-Hyeon is an F-rank hunter stuck in a deadly tower. After dying countless times, he awakens a necromancy skill that allows him to grow stronger with each death. He begins his ascent, using the power of death itself to become unstoppable.

titre: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World
description: A hero chooses an unconventional weapon—a hammer—to fight against the demon king and save the world. Through dedication and unique fighting styles, he proves that any weapon can be legendary in the right hands.

A healer with the unique ability to consume poisons and toxins to heal others. This dangerous method makes them invaluable yet controversial, as they risk their life to save others by absorbing deadly substances.

In 2022, monsters emerge threatening humanity. The story follows survivors as they fight, hide, or adapt to a world where monsters have become part of daily life, exploring how humanity changes when facing constant supernatural threats.

titre: More Than a Married Couple, But not Lovers
description: In a school program where students are paired as practice couples, Jirou is matched with Akari instead of his crush. Despite their initial reluctance, they must act as a married couple, leading to complicated feelings as they pretend to be closer than they are.

The Demon King of the game Satisfy is returned to the day the game launched, 15 years in the past. With complete knowledge of the game's future, he dominates as a newbie player, using his experience to achieve what took him years in a fraction of the time.

titre: The Cafe Terrace and its Goddesses

description: Kim Suho is reincarnated as Lloyd Frontera, the lazy eldest son of a baron's family on the brink of ruin. Using his engineering knowledge from his past life, Lloyd transforms his estate through innovative construction projects, becoming an unlikely savior of his family and territory.

titre: I Have Become The Heroe's Rival
An Archdemon's Dilemma, How to Love Your Elf Bride
genre: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Drama - Fantasy - Romance

titre: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy (Manhwa)
description: A writer who created a dark fantasy novel dies and is reincarnated into his own story as a minor villain destined to die. Now attending the prestigious Temple Academy, he must survive using his knowledge of the plot while trying to change his fate.

In a Victorian-era world mixed with supernatural elements and steampunk technology, Zhou Mingrui awakens as Klein Moretti after a mysterious ritual. He discovers a world of secret organizations, ancient gods, and mystical pathways to power, navigating occult mysteries while trying to maintain his sanity.

Kim Dokja is an ordinary office worker whose only joy is reading his favorite web novel, 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' When the novel suddenly becomes reality, he's the only person who knows how the story unfolds. Using his knowledge, he navigates deadly scenarios, forms alliances, and tries to survive in a world where humanity faces trials for the entertainment of god-like beings.

titre: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy (Web Novel)

Using his brother's detailed diary about the tower's secrets, Yeon-woo enters to seek revenge and uncover the truth, climbing through dangerous floors filled with monsters and powerful beings.

titre: Revenge of the Iron Blooded Sword Hound

description: Kim Rok Soo wakes up as Cale Henituse, a minor trash noble character from a novel he read. Knowing the future destruction awaiting the world, he plans to live quietly and avoid the main plot. However, his actions to secure a peaceful life inadvertently make him a key player in preventing the catastrophe, gathering powerful allies along the way.

Sejun accidentally enters a mysterious tower and finds himself trapped on Floor 99, a barren wasteland. Unlike other climbers who fight monsters, he survives by farming. His unique approach to tower climbing through agriculture attracts peculiar companions and transforms the tower's ecosystem.

description: A martial god who reached the pinnacle of strength regresses to level 2 with all his knowledge intact. He must climb back to power while preventing the catastrophes he failed to stop in his previous life.

A producer gets a second chance at life, regressing to his younger days. Using his industry knowledge and experience, he aims to make better decisions in his career and personal life, changing the entertainment industry.
People are forced to participate in deadly live-streamed games where their survival is broadcast for entertainment. They must complete dangerous missions while viewers watch, betting on their lives.

description: A legendary knight king returns to modern Earth after 20 years in another world. Bringing his god with him, he adapts to modern society while using his holy powers and medieval values to face new threats.

A genius knight diagnosed with a terminal illness regresses to his childhood. With knowledge of his impending death and events to come, he uses his tactical brilliance to change his fate and grow stronger despite his condition.

Eris wakes up as the villainess in a fantasy novel, but unlike others, she has no attachment to this world and desperately wants to return home. She defies the story's plot, rejecting her role and searching for a way back to her original life.

A lawyer with supernatural abilities fights against corruption and injustice in a society where laws are twisted by the powerful. He uses both legal knowledge and his special powers to deliver true justice.

description: Lee Jun-Woo returns from a hellish tutorial where he became incredibly powerful. Now back in the real world as an awakened being, he tries to live a normal life as a single father while his overwhelming strength constantly creates comedic situations.

Jin Mu-Won is the last survivor of the Northern Heavenly Sect after it's destroyed by betrayal. Living in isolation with his father's legacy martial arts manual, he emerges years later to seek revenge and restore his sect's honor in a world of martial arts clans and political intrigue.

description: King Grey, a powerful ruler in his previous life, is reborn in a magical world as Arthur Leywin. With his past memories and combat experience, he navigates this new world filled with magic, magical beasts, and ancient powers, determined to protect his new family and uncover the world's mysteries.

A knight stuck in an endless time loop where he dies repeatedly uses each regression to perfect his combat skills and tactical knowledge. Through countless deaths, he grows stronger, seeking to finally break free from the cycle.

In a world where humans and other races coexist, a martial artist fights to protect humanity and achieve his dreams of martial supremacy. His indomitable will drives him forward through countless challenges.

Jiwoo is a kind-hearted high school student with secret super-speed abilities who helps stray cats. When he rescues an injured cat, he discovers it's actually Kayden, a powerful awakened human in hiding. Kayden becomes Jiwoo's mentor, teaching him to control his powers in a world of awakened beings.

A magician who specializes in close combat rather than traditional spellcasting tears through a magic academy. His unconventional fighting style using body-enhancement magic makes him a formidable and unpredictable opponent.

In a martial arts world filled with mysteries and supernatural elements, a protagonist with unique abilities navigates through various factions, uncovering hidden truths and growing stronger through his encounters.

An executioner in a dark fantasy world carries out sentences while harboring his own sense of justice. As he uncovers corruption in the system he serves, he must decide whether to continue following orders or forge his own path.

titre: The Prosecutor Doesn’t Know The Law
Trash of the Count's Family (Web Novel)
Reincarnation of the Suicidal Battle God
description: After fighting demons for decades as humanity's last hope, Zephyr is betrayed and killed. He awakens in the past, before the demon invasion began. With his battle experience and knowledge of future events, he aims to prevent the apocalypse and save those he lost.

Lee Geon, one of the thirteen Sacred Heroes who fought to save the world, was betrayed and left to die by his comrades 20 years ago. He returns seeking revenge against those who betrayed him, now wielding even greater power than before.

titre: The Margrave's Bastard Son was The Emperor
description: After ruling as emperor for decades, he awakens in the past as a bastard son with no rights. Using his knowledge of politics, warfare, and magic from his previous life, he aims to reclaim his throne and prevent past tragedies.

A low-rank hunter receives exclusive guidance from a mysterious entity in the tower. With this unique advantage, he climbs floors that others find impossible, gathering power and uncovering the tower's secrets.

After dying in battle, the Heavenly Demon is reborn in the body of a weak child. With his vast martial arts knowledge and demonic techniques, he begins his path to reclaim his position as the supreme martial artist.

Trapped in a dangerous otherworld, the protagonist must use his wits and gradually increasing powers to survive and find a way back home, facing monsters and uncovering the world's mysteries along the way.

titre: Return of the Mount Hua Sect
description: Chung Myung, the 13th disciple of Mount Hua Sect, dies after defeating the Heavenly Demon. He awakens 100 years later reincarnated in a child's body, only to find his beloved sect has fallen into ruin. With his past memories and skills, he works to restore Mount Hua to its former glory.

titre: The World's Finest Assassin Gets Reincarnated in Another World as an Aristocrat
genre: Action - Adventure - Comedy - Drama - Ecchi - Fantasy - Harem - Romance

description: In a world ravaged by disaster, survivors must adapt to harsh new realities. The story follows individuals struggling to maintain humanity while facing monsters, hostile factions, and scarce resources.

After being betrayed and thrown into hell for years, the hero returns with demonic power. He seeks revenge against those who wronged him while battling the monsters threatening humanity, walking the line between hero and demon.

Lee Kiyoung is a con artist who awakens in an apocalyptic world. When he discovers his childhood friend is a regressor who knows the future, he manipulates situations to his advantage, surviving through cunning rather than strength.

A necromancer with catastrophic power must control his abilities while facing a world that fears and hunts those who command the dead. He navigates through conflicts while growing his undead army and mastering forbidden arts.

A high school student determined to win over his crush employs various elaborate schemes and strategies. The series follows his comedic attempts at romance while navigating typical school life challenges.

Yeon-woo's twin brother disappeared and died in the mysterious Tower. Using his brother's diary filled with secrets and strategies, Yeon-woo enters the tower seeking revenge, rapidly climbing floors with his inherited knowledge and growing power.

In a world where people awaken talents, one student has the ability to copy and enhance the talents of others. As he collects more talents, he becomes an unprecedented existence, facing both opportunities and dangers.

titre: The Return of the Crazy Demon
description: Yi Zaha, known as the Crazy Demon, dies and regresses to his youth. Determined to not repeat his painful past, he uses his martial arts mastery and chaotic personality to forge a different path through the martial world.

After humanity is annihilated in the tutorials, Jaehwan is the sole survivor who refused to quit. Alone in an endless nightmare, he survives through sheer willpower for decades. When he finally completes the last stage, he awakens in a new world where he must navigate as the only one who experienced true despair.

titre: Return of the Frozen Player (Web Novel)

description: Suchan Jang has kept his insect wings hidden all his life. When he uses them to save someone, his secret is exposed, forcing him to flee. He discovers a hidden society of insect humans and enrolls in a special university while facing threats from both human society and dangerous insect humans.

titre: Death Is the Only Ending for the Villainess
description: A girl awakens as Penelope Eckhart, the villainess of a dating sim game in Hard Mode. Every choice leads toward death endings, and all the male leads harbor murderous intent toward her. She must navigate this dangerous game world while trying to survive and return to her original life.

titre: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

genre: Action - Adventure - Fantasy - Game - Virtual Reality
description: Grid is an unlucky man until he stumbles upon the legendary class Pagma's Successor in the VR game Satisfy. As a blacksmith who can create legendary items, he begins his journey from the bottom to becoming one of the game's most powerful players, though his bad luck continues to cause problems.

genre: Action - Martial Arts - Science Fiction - Fantasy
description: Cheon Yeo-Woon, the orphaned son of the Demon Cult's leader's seventh wife, is mistreated and bullied. A descendant from the future injects him with nanomachines that grant him a futuristic AI assistant. With this technology in a martial arts world, he rapidly grows stronger and navigates clan politics.
